description: Using frozen orange wedges in this healthy green smoothie makes it thick and creamy.
keywords: Green Orange Dreamsicle Smoothie, smoothie recipe
name: Green Orange Dreamsicle Smoothie
recipeIngredient: 1 c. non-dairy milk (vanilla flavored will work, but my favorite is Blue Diamond's almond & coconut blend)
2 small oranges (cut into wedges, peeled and frozen)
about 5 small kale leaves (or a handful of spinach)
sweetener of choice to taste (if desired)

recipeInstructions.text: Combine all ingredients in blender, pouring milk in first. Using the variable speed dial, start out at 1 and slowly increase speed to 10. Once large chunks have been pureed, switch to high speed and continue to blend until completely smooth.
